entry.title: $2500 // 2 BR Apartment for Rent
entry.content:
Beautiful 2 bedroom floor-through brownstone with gorgeous finishes throughout, this is a spacious must see apartment. Large newly renovated kitchen and bathroom. Situated on the second floor on a lovely quiet tree lined street in the heart of Sunset Park.

The kitchen and living room overlook the surrounding rear grounds of botanical greenery as far as the eye can see. There is a terrace that will be ready for spring for some outdoor space.

The 45th St stop on the N/R/W trains is just 2 blocks away and you are just 25 minutes to NYC! You are steps to Greenwood Heights and Park Slope, as well as, 1 block and steps to all cafes, shopping, gyms and Sunset Park!

Heat, Hot Water, Cooking Gas and Electricity all included in the rent.

No Pets Please!

Please contact to set up a viewing.
